title: Bug 19458[Navigator] Copy Project dialog UI problems
description: Bug 19458[Navigator] Copy Project dialog UI problems this is in red text.
OB: When the project name 'test' is chosen, a static text validation error appears on the dialog.
EB: If the default location checkbox is unchecked, the default location should remain in the edit box. It should not be cleared. The text color should be black and it should include the standard on-the-fly validation small error icon.
SR:
1. Open the Copy Project dialog.
2. Choose the project name as 'test'.
3. Notice the static text validation error on the dialog.
4. Uncheck the default location checkbox and observe the behavior of the edit box.
